languages.text: "Глобальные бедствия нередко порождают подобные культы некрофагов. Прискорбно, до чего может опуститься отчаявшийся человек, отрезанный от Империума... Впрочем, в сторону антропологические лекции — лучше заняться прикладными делами и избавить твой мир от этой мрази".

"Global disasters often produce necrophage cults such as this. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... But it would be best to set the anthropological observations aside in favour of practical considerations, such as ridding your world of this filth."
languages.original_text: "Глобальные бедствия нередко порождают подобные культы некрофагов. Прискорбно, до чего может опуститься отчаявшийся человек, отрезанный от Империума... Впрочем, в сторону антропологические лекции — лучше заняться прикладными делами и избавить твой мир от этой мрази".

traits.locale_text: "Global disasters often produce such necrophage cults. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... Anthropological lectures aside, it would be best to apply our practical knowledge and rid your world of this filth."

languages.text: “行星遭受灾难之后，往往会诞生像这样的食尸邪教。绝望之人失去了与帝国的联系之后，竟会沦落到如此地步，这实在是令人感到遗憾……不过，人类学的观察还是先放在一边吧，我们需要做些更加实际的事情。比如说，将你们这些污秽之物从这个世界上净化掉。”
languages.original_text: "Global disasters often produce necrophage cults such as this. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... But it would be best to set the anthropological observations aside in favour of practical considerations, such as ridding your world of this filth."

traits.locale_text: “行星遭受灾难之后，往往会诞生像这样的食尸邪教。绝望之人失去了与帝国的联系之后，竟会沦落到如此地步，这实在是令人感到遗憾……不过，人类学的观察还是先放在一边吧，我们需要做些更加实际的事情。比如说，将你们这些污秽之物从这个世界上净化掉。”

languages.text: «Los desastres globales suelen generar cultos necrófagos como este. Es lamentable lo bajo que puede caer un hombre al quedar aislado del Imperium... pero será mejor dejar a un lado las observaciones antropológicas y centrarnos en asuntos más prácticos, como librar su mundo de esta plaga».
languages.original_text: "Global disasters often produce necrophage cults such as this. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... But it would be best to set the anthropological observations aside in favour of practical considerations, such as ridding your world of this filth."

traits.locale_text: «Los desastres globales suelen generar cultos necrófagos como este. Es lamentable lo bajo que puede caer un hombre al quedar aislado del Imperium... pero será mejor dejar a un lado las observaciones antropológicas y centrarnos en asuntos más prácticos, como librar su mundo de esta plaga».

languages.text: 「惑星規模の災害は死肉食主義の宗派を生むことが多い、ご覧のとおりだな。帝国を離れてから、こんな捨て身の男を減らすことになるとは残念だ…だが、現実的な利益はさておき、人類学の観察材料には最適だろう。このゴミをお前の星から排除できるわけだしな」
languages.original_text: "Global disasters often produce necrophage cults such as this. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... But it would be best to set the anthropological observations aside in favour of practical considerations, such as ridding your world of this filth."

traits.locale_text: 「惑星規模の災害は死肉食主義の宗派を生むことが多い、ご覧のとおりだな。帝国を離れてから、こんな捨て身の男を減らすことになるとは残念だ…だが、現実的な利益はさておき、人類学の観察材料には最適だろう。このゴミをお前の星から排除できるわけだしな」

languages.text: « Ce genre de culte nécrophage a une fâcheuse tendance à apparaître lors des grandes catastrophes. Il est regrettable qu'un homme désespéré puisse tomber aussi bas lorsqu'il se retrouve coupé de l'Imperium... Mais nous ferions mieux de garder nos observations anthropologiques pour plus tard ; l'heure est aux considérations pratiques, à commencer par débarrasser le monde de cette infamie. »
languages.original_text: "Global disasters often produce necrophage cults such as this. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... But it would be best to set the anthropological observations aside in favour of practical considerations, such as ridding your world of this filth."

traits.locale_text: « Ce genre de culte nécrophage a une fâcheuse tendance à apparaître lors des grandes catastrophes. Il est regrettable qu'un homme désespéré puisse tomber aussi bas lorsqu'il se retrouve coupé de l'Imperium... Mais nous ferions mieux de garder nos observations anthropologiques pour plus tard ; l'heure est aux considérations pratiques, à commencer par débarrasser le monde de cette infamie. »

languages.text: "Weltweite Katastrophen bringen häufig Nekrophagenkulte wie diesen hervor. Es ist traurig, wie weit verzweifelte Menschen sinken können, wenn sie vom Imperium getrennt werden ... Aber wir sollten die anthropologischen Betrachtungen zurückstellen und uns praktischen Überlegungen widmen, wie zum Beispiel, Eure Welt von diesem Schmutz zu befreien."
languages.original_text: "Global disasters often produce necrophage cults such as this. It is unfortunate what a desperate man can be reduced to after being cut off from the Imperium... But it would be best to set the anthropological observations aside in favour of practical considerations, such as ridding your world of this filth."
